TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConstructorArgumentAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ConstructorArgumentAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ConstructorArgumentAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定可使用非預設建構函式語法而初始化的物件，以及所指定名稱的屬性可提供建構資訊。

span.span: Specifies that an object can be initialized by using a non-default constructor syntax, and that a property of the specified name supplies construction information.

summary.span: 這項資訊主要供 XAML 序列化之用。

span.span: This information is primarily for XAML serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定可以由建構函式參數初始化相關聯的屬性，並要忽略的 XAML 序列化建構函式用來建構執行個體。This attribute specifies that the associated property can be initialized by a constructor parameter and should be ignored for XAML serialization if the constructor is used to construct the instance. 這提供更好的來回行程表示參數化建構函式語法，而非預設建構函式具現化加上特定的屬性。This provides better round trip representations for parameterized constructor syntax rather than default constructor instantiation plus specific attributes. Framework 可以可能支援保留標記延伸使用方式和 reconstituting 它們，而非依賴`ProvideValue`輸出中序列化的物件樹狀結構。A framework can potentially support preserving markup extension usages and reconstituting them rather than relying on `ProvideValue` output in the object tree for serialization. 在此情況下，資訊，以便產生一般的標記延伸使用方式的精確表示序列化期間會很有用。In this case, the information is useful during serialization for producing an accurate representation of the typical markup extension usage. 如需標記延伸的詳細資訊，請參閱[標記延伸 XAML 概觀](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information about markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md). 若要有效類型的公用屬性，非預設建構函式必須支援只有一個參數。In order to be valid for a attribution, a type's public non-default constructor must support exactly one parameter. 參數名稱必須對應到讀取/寫入屬性。The name of the parameter must correspond to a read/write property. 屬性否則必須為可序列化。The property must be otherwise serializable. 您可以使用這個屬性來建立於建構函式，參數名稱與屬性之間的對應關係。You use this attribute to create the correspondence between the name of the parameter in the constructor, and the property. 具體而言，將這個屬性套用至連線的讀/寫屬性的屬性層級定義。Specifically, you apply this attribute to the property-level definition of the connecting read/write property. 取用者可能情況下會擲回其中未解析為類型備份，或是套用至沒有適當的建構引數和引數數目的型別時。Consumers of may throw in cases where does not resolve to type backing, or when applied to a type that does not have the appropriate construction arguments and arity. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 如需標記延伸和 WPF 的詳細資訊，請參閱[標記延伸和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information about markup extensions and WPF, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string argumentName) cil managed

param.name: argumentName
param.span: 將初始化相關聯屬性的建構函式名稱。

span.span: The name of the constructor that will initialize the associated property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ArgumentName As String
public: property System::String ^ ArgumentName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得將初始化相關聯屬性的建構函式名稱參數。

span.span: Gets the name parameter of the constructor that will initialize the associated property.

value.span: 假設 CLR 支援，這會對應到相關建構函式參數的 。

span.span: Assuming CLR backing, this corresponds to the of the relevant constructor parameter.
